src:
'Arsenal, Klub Sepak Bola atau Klub Basket?'
04 Nov 2019, 14:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Mantan pemain Arsenal, Ian Wright, tidak bisa menutupi kebingungannya ketika melihat permainan tim musim ini. Dia merasa Arsenal belum benar-benar berkembang di bawah Unai Emery, justru mungkin lebih buruk.
The Gunners kembali menelan hasil mengecewakan ketika hanya mampu bermain imbang 1-1 dengan Wolverhampton di Emirates Stadium akhir pekan lalu. Hasil imbang itu hampir sama dengan hasil pekan sebelumnya, 2-2 kontra Crystal Palace.
Saat ini Arsenal ada di peringkat ke-5 klasemen sementara dengan 17 poin dari 11 pertandingan. Perlahan-lahan, jarak dari empat besar kian melebar. Posisi Emery pun tidak lagi aman.
Bagi Wright, kekurangan terbesar Arsenal musim ini adalah ketidakmampuan menuntaskan pertandingan lebih cepat.

Apa maksudnya? Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
'Arsenal, Football Club or Basketball Club?'
Nov 04 2019, 14:30 by Bola.net
Former Arsenal player, Ian Wright, could not cover his confusion when he saw the team play this season. He felt Arsenal had not really developed under Unai Emery, it might have been worse.
The Gunners again swallowed disappointing results when only able to draw 1-1 with Wolverhampton at the Emirates Stadium last weekend. The draw was almost the same as the previous week's result, 2-2 cons of Crystal Palace.
Arsenal are currently ranked 5th in the standings with 17 points from 11 matches. Slowly, the distance from the four big widened. Emery's position is no longer safe.
For Wright, Arsenal's biggest shortcoming this season is the inability to finish the match faster.

What does it mean? Read below, Bolaneters!
